title: Sales Development Support
job_overview:
Job Description:

We are a US-based high-end research software company in the government contracting industry looking to grow our sales team. As a member of our sales team, you will have a chance to partake in our mission to provide customized, real-time, and accurate capture intelligence not available elsewhere.

Responsibilities:
-Initiating dialogue with prospective customers
-Communicating with high-level executives via phone and email
-Answering questions and inquiries pertaining to the services provided by VoicedIQ
-Support any other internal efforts as needed

You'd be a good fit if:
-You have excellent English communication skills (both verbal and written)
-You are willing to learn and work hard
-You are comfortable conducting phone calls and communicating over email
-You have passion and tenacity to make a meaningful impact

Even if you don't meet all the criteria or have exact aligned experience, we encourage you to apply. We provide the necessary training to be successful in the role.

This is a full time role with working hours 8:30am EST to 5:30pm EST Monday thru Friday.

How to Apply:
Please share the best email to reach you at and a recruiter will reach out with next steps.
